name: Helzephyr

aura.name: wings_of_death
aura.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Applies Dark damage to the player's attacks while mounted.

description: It calls forth lightning from the depths of hell. One who dies from Helzephyr's inferno is sure to be sent to the underworld.

skills.name: spirit_fire
skills.description: Shoots fireballs towards an enemy. The fireballs explode after a short distance, generating smaller fireballs that spread forward.

skills.name: dark_ball
skills.description: Unleashes a sphere of darkness that slowly tracks down the enemy.

skills.name: shadow_burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges dark energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: flare_storm
skills.description: Generates two flaming tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: spirit_flame
skills.description: Fires three balls of malice that relentlessly pursue an enemy.

skills.name: nightmare_ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of darkness and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: dark_laser
skills.description: Charges dark energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
